results.definition: a very young child (birth to 1 year) who has not yet begun to walk or talk
examples: the baby began to cry again
she held the baby in her arms
it sounds simple, but when you have your own baby it is all so different

results.definition: an unborn child; a human fetus
examples: I felt healthy and very feminine carrying the baby
it was great to feel my baby moving about inside

results.definition: a project of personal concern to someone
the youngest member of a group (not necessarily young)
examples: the baby of the Supreme Court
